duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet and exceed sales quota in the capital equipment business, navigating complex organizations and sales cycles.
Communicate effectively, personalize sales message, and drive the customer to a decision.
Build and maintain strong relationships, consult customers through surveys and demos into finding the right product for their applications.
Lead consultative sales process in a multi-channel environment using Salesforce.com to organize and forecast sales opportunities.

education_certification.credential: B.A. or B.S. degree. Minimum 3 years of experience in industrial B2B sales with a focus on complex organizations and multi-layer decision-making processes.
Experience with distributors or dealers, selling capital equipment in a multi-channel environment.
Experience in leading a consultative sales process in the capital equipment business.
Experience using Salesforce.com to organize and forecast sales opportunities.
Sales training certifications are a plus.
